title.narrative: 3.2. SOCIAL PROTECTION AND CHILD POVERTY

description.narrative: Output 3.2: By the end of 2021, national and subnational capacities in the design and implementation of integrated child-sensitive social protection programmes are enhanced., which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Access To Inclusive Social Protection (Covid), Cross Sectoral - Children With Disabilities, Economic And Social Policy General, Public Finance And Local Governance, Reducing Child Poverty, Reducing Child Poverty (Covid), Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 3: By the end of 2021, the most disadvantaged children benefit from enhanced evidence-based and integrated social protection and poverty reduction policies, programmes and institutions

participating-org.narrative: VEZARAT TAAVON KAR VA REFAHE EJTEMA

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 3.2: By the end of 2021, national and subnational capacities in the design and implementation of integrated child-sensitivesocial protection programmes are enhanced.

description.narrative: In 2021, Iran’s national social protection system continued to be stretched due to the pandemic and ;the escalating inflation. In addition to other socioeconomic multi-dimensional vulnerabilities among household with children has; further been aggravated. CO continued to support MCLSW as the lead social protection ministry to address the system gaps and moving;towards an integrated child-sensitive social protection system and services that is shock responsive. CO continued to advocate also for inclsuive SP service in light of the new Afghan refugees crisis and the new influx to the country.;; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:05/01/2022
